data.title: Banks in Lamoni, Iowa
data.meta_description: BTC Bank is proud to be Community Minded…Just Like You. We invite you to visit our Lamoni branch for all your personal and business banking needs!
data.text:
Welcome to BTC Bank in Lamoni, IA

Welcome to our BTC Branch in the City of Lamoni, a community with forward-thinking values of agriculture, industry and family that closely align with our own. In 2011 we expanded across state lines to open our first Iowa location here in Lamoni. If you’re comparing banks in Lamoni, come check us out!

Mortgage Lenders, Commercial Lenders, and Ag Lenders in Lamoni

BTC Bank is proud to offer competitive and cutting-edge financial products and services to local individuals, businesses, and farmers. With nearly 100 years of community banking behind us, we understand how to deliver the banking experience you need with the hospitality you want. Visit our Lamoni location to meet with one of our on-site lenders for your business or personal loan needs. You can also take pride in knowing that the money you deposit with BTC goes back into your community. We are community minded just like you!

Where to find BTC Bank in Lamoni

Centrally located off I-35 along Hwy 69 and across from Kum & Go, BTC Lamoni has a large, modern building with its own parking lot. Look for our beige stucco exterior with brown stone accents and rock pillars in the front of the building.

You can visit us for lobby banking services between 8-4, Monday through Friday. When you’re in a rush or it’s too cold to get of your car, take advantage of our drive-up hours, which run later than lobby banking during the week and provide convenient Saturday morning service.

Community Involvement

Every December we host a holiday open house at the Lamoni location. We also have a Community Appreciation BBQ in the summer and a Fall Customer Appreciation week. Local non-profits and other organizations can book our community room. You’ll also find us at the local county fair, sponsoring Lamoni school t-shirts, and getting involved with various other charitable causes.

Contact us today!

When you visit us in Lamoni, you’ll find friendly, knowledgeable employees and a welcoming hometown atmosphere. Our staff is part of your community—all of us live and shop here—and all of our decisions are made locally. Stop by to say hi or give us a call.
